statements: SELECT * FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, purchase_total ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT loyalty_id, customer_id FROM loyalty_program WHERE purchase_total > 1000
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY customer_id
SELECT loyalty_id FROM loyalty_program WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE customer_id = '3d15c14e-f0e2-4adb-af84-04c07d1663b0' ORDER BY purchase_date
SELECT loyalty_id, customer_id, purchase_total, purchase_date FROM loyalty_program WHERE purchase_total > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE customer_id = '7f7434dd-2106-4c89-8dd0-0f789b07e0cd' ORDER BY purchase_total ASC

SELECT loyalty_id, customer_id, purchase_total FROM loyalty_program WHERE customer_id IN ('7f7434dd-2106-4c89-8dd0-0f789b07e0cd', 'cf81a3e2-96d0-446e-84a9-207d9bdf75f5') ORDER BY customer_id, purchase_total DESC
SELECT loyalty_id, purchase_total, purchase_date FROM loyalty_program WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-10-31' ORDER BY purchase_date ASC
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY customer_id
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT program_name, end_date FROM loyalty_programs WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT program_id, program_name FROM loyalty_programs ORDER BY program_name ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM customer_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM loyalty_programs WHERE program_name LIKE '%Gold%';
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs ORDER BY program_name ASC;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM loyalty_programs WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT program_id, program_name, start_date FROM loyalty_programs WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_transactions WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;

SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS number_of_transactions, MAX(total_amount) AS max_transaction_amount FROM customer_transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING number_of_transactions >= 5 ORDER BY max_transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers
SELECT purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM purchases
SELECT customer_id, email, loyalty_points FROM customers
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT purchase_id, customer_id, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE points_required > 100;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points < 50;
SELECT purchase_id, customer_id, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT program_name, reward_type FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customer ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchase WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer.name, engagement_type, engagement_date FROM engagement JOIN customer ON customer.customer_id = engagement.customer_id ORDER BY engagement_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT program_name, reward_type FROM loyalty_program WHERE reward_points > 100;
SELECT customer.name, purchase.total_amount FROM customer JOIN purchase ON customer.customer_id = purchase.customer_id;
SELECT purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchase ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM engagement WHERE engagement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT customer_name, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM engagement WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY loyalty_program_id DESC;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM loyalty_program WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY program_name;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM engagement GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_interactions >= 5 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
